name: Dungeon? (with a question mark)
description:
You are a hero in search of adventure. It is when you reach a small village where you find it (or does it find you - that's something to think about there). Dungeon? (with a question mark) is a high-tension dungeon platformer, where traps lie around every corner! Can you make it out alive?  Also I'm very sorry but my unity denied the WebGL

Instructions: download the file, find the zipped folder and select extract, then press the application entitled "testing generally" (which was what I originally decided to call it). A window should appear, and you should press "play" (or "launch", I can't remember what it says).

This game was made for the 72 hour Benbonk gamejam. Credit to theleah_ for font
